text: TVyNovelas is a Mexican music and gossip magazine. The magazine is published by Editorial Televisa. The magazine is available in the United States (and Puerto Rico), Mexico, Argentina, Chile and Colombia. TVyNovelas is one of the most-widely read magazine for Spanish-language soap opera fans. Their awards show, Premios TVyNovelas, is broadcast on Televisa and Univision. ==Other websites== * TVyNovelas at the Televisa website. * TVyNovelas Chile . * TVyNovelas website and forum in Poland. * Premios TVyNovelas at the Univision website. * Photos of Premios TVyNovelas MÃ©xico . * Premios TVyNovelas Colombia . title: TVyNovelas
